Sometimes, we need to oscillate To and fro? things become tough when interwoven together.

forensic.name: Gibberish
forensic.desc:
NASA receive a weird transmission yesterday but they were't able to decode it. I mean, it's just a bunch of gibberish. The only thing they have cracked was one word "goodbye"
They have no clue what that means though. Can you help them?
Flag Format:
dsc{[a-zA-Z0-9_]+}

forensic.name: Hash Roll
forensic.desc:
Augustine's friend took a important file of augustine and stashed it.
He was able to grab all the files from his friend's machine but he is worried that the files are encrypted.
Help him get the file back
Author: Rakhul
Flag Format:
dsc{[a-zA-Z0-9_]+}

forensic.name: Magicplay
forensic.desc:
Dwayne's mischevious nephew played around in his pc and corrupted a very important file..
Help dwayne recover it!

forensic.name: Space Ahoy
forensic.desc:
Brian tries to send some crucial information from the spacestation about an impending disaster through a super secure line to his friend through a picture.
Help his friend uncover the truth ..
Author: Rakhul
Flag Format:

pwn.name: Easy Peasy
pwn.desc:
A super secret piece of information has been hidden behind a program made by 1337 hackers.
Find this crucial piece of information
Author: Anand Rajaram

rev.name: whatThe
rev.desc:
Mr.Python had a very bad dream, so he told his father mr.see about it. He said he was dreaming in a dream and was very frustating to his brain.He send this file to him so that he could also experience. After seeing the file mr.see just said whatThe.
Author: Mayhul

steg.name: Gambit
steg.desc:
My colleague Beaufort challenged me for a chess game, Since he is professional he adviced me that "In this game stability is the key."
Can you find the final position in this situation?
Author: Kartik Gupta
White-to-play, Mate-in-4-moves the pieces are on the board as follows:
White:
Kh8
Qa3
Rf1
f2
Black:
Kh2
Bb8,and Bh5
c3, f3, g4, f6
